alert.note: Alert for Dillon; Marlboro (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 30 at 4:44PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Dillon and eastern Marlboro Counties through 545 PM EDT... At 443 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm located between Clio, Bennettsville, and Tatum, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also possible. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Bennettsville, Mccoll, Clio, Bingham, Dunbar, Minturn and Tatum. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, then seek shelter inside a building until the storm passes.
